nodes.text: Reconfigurable blasters were a class of multi-purpose blaster that could be adapted to serve different functions by changing certain modules on the weapon.

The DC-17m Interchangeable Weapon System used by the Grand Army of the Republic's clone commandos could change between a repeating blaster rifle and grenade launcher by switching the weapon's barrel module.
The DL-44 heavy blaster pistol could have a stock and extended barrel attached to transform the pistol into a small carbine.
Other reconfigurable blasters included the A-180 blaster, A280-CFE convertible heavy blaster pistol, A-300 blaster rifle, and the Relby K-25 blaster.
